tip: Plastic bottle caps are usually recyclable along with the bottle!
Pizza boxes can now be recycled.
When it comes to recycling,every community is different.
Many recycling programs don’t accept paper cups because of the waxy lining.
Plastic bag and film recycling doesn’t stop with grocery bags.
Reduce and reuse first to shrink your environmental footprint!
What you don’t put in your recycling bin is just as important as what you do recycle.
Keep bags for both trash and recycling in your car.
Close the loop by buying recycled content material.
